title: Eliminate a Variable
text: The equations are already in standard form. To get opposite coefficients of x, multiply the second equation by 6. \\n $$6x-5y=-75$$ \\n (-x-2*y=-13)*6

title: Solve for y
text: x will be eliminated and then solve for y. \\n $$-17y=-153$$ \\n $$y=9$$

title: Substitute and Solve for x
text: Substitute $$y=9$$ into one of the original equations and solve for x. \\n $$6x-5y-75$$ \\n $$6x-5\times9=-75$$ \\n $$6x-45=-75$$ \\n $$x=-5$$

title: Solution as Ordered Pair
text: Solution to the system of equations is (-5,9).
